name: status-point
description: Task Management System with Clean Architecture

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: npx concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm start --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
